room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: So much fun and so worth it!!! Would love to come back and do more rooms!!!

room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: Fun experience. It's is definitely an experiment on behavior and interactions. Can't wait to come back and do new rooms! Our Truman Room guide for our first time helped make it an amazing experience.

room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: Had a blast in the Truman Room and we were able to breakout with time to spare. It's a fun, exhilarating challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: Best time ever!! Lots of fun. Went with the family for a birthday party. It was great!!

room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: Absolutely wonderful. We did Truman room, and it exceeded my expectations. It was more elaborate than I ever expected. Well worth your time and money.

room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: This was incredible. So much more challenging than I thought it would be. I had 10 friends with me and we all thought it was the best way to spend our Saturday morning. I can't wait to try all the rooms!!! I have found my new hobby

room_title: Escape room "Breakout with Truman" by Breakout KC in Kansas City
review: Did the Truman Room with my team from work on a team outing. It was very challenging but enjoyed it and was able to escape! I'm excited to try another room with my friends again. Its for sure an out of the ordinary experience and a great bonding experience as well!
